prompts: Create a bipedal fire-type Pokemon with strong legs and blazing flames for arms.
I want a powerful Pokemon with fiery features and a fierce expression ready for battle.
Generate a humanoid Pokemon that embodies the spirit of flames and agility in its design.
Make a dynamic fire and fighting-type Pokemon that showcases speed and strength.
Imagine a Pokemon with a muscular build and fiery accents that can dominate in combat.
Design a fierce fire Pokemon with striking colors and a determined stance for an epic showdown.
Show me a unique Pokemon with flame-like features and an impressive battle-ready pose.
